results.name: Ocelot
results.shortDescription: The Ocelot is also known as the dwarf leopard.

results.name: Tiger
results.shortDescription: The tiger is the largest of the cat species.

results.name: Mountain Lion
results.shortDescription: Like almost all cats, the mountain lion is a solitary animal.

results.name: Leopard
results.shortDescription: The leopard is the smallest of the four big cats.

results.name: Lion
results.shortDescription: The male lion is easily recognised by its mane.

results.name: Cheetah
results.shortDescription: The cheetah can run faster than any other land animal.

results.name: Jaguar
results.shortDescription: Jaguars enjoy a nice swim from time to time.

results.name: Snow Leopard
results.shortDescription: Snow Leopards are cute and cuddly. Really.

results.name: Lynx
results.shortDescription: Lynx have a short tail and characteristic tufts of black hair on their ears.

results.name: Serval
results.shortDescription: The Serval is a strong yet slender animal, with long legs and a fairly short tail.

results.name: Caracal
results.shortDescription: The caracal is also known as the desert lynx.

results.name: Geoffroy's Cat
results.shortDescription: The Geoffroy's cat is a wild cat native to southern and central South America

results.name: Oncilla
results.shortDescription: The Oncilla is also know as the tiger cat.

results.name: Margay
results.shortDescription: Also known as the tree ocelot. They live in S. America.

results.name: Bobcat
results.shortDescription: Bobcats live all over North America.
